Package controllers

package controllers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddAppointmentController
    FXML Controller class This class is used to control the Add Appointment screen This class is used to add a new appointment to the database This class is used to validate the appointment data before saving it to the database This class is used to check if the appointment is within business hours This class is used to check if the appointment is scheduled for a weekend This class is used to check if the appointment overlaps with any existing appointments for the same customer
    AddCustomerController
    This class is the controller for the Add Customer view.
    HomeController
    This class is the controller for the Home view.
    LoginController
    This class is the controller for the login view.
    ModifyAppointmentController
    This class is the controller for the Modify Appointment view.
    ModifyCustomerController
    This class is the controller for the Add Customer view.
    ReportController
    This class is the controller for the report view.
